data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in East Siang.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of East Siang, Arunachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in East Siang. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of East Siang, Arunachal Pradesh, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the county of East Siang who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Miri people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 44,100 people living in the county of East Siang.
Spirit, please defend the 485 believers in East Siang against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Lord, make the 485 believers in East Siang to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 43,615 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

location.name: East Siang
location.people_groups_list: Tagin Bangni, Adi Minyong, Adi Bori
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Tagin Bangni (600), Adi Minyong (24,000), Adi Bori (300)
